about_the_game:
Toxic Therapy is an immersive experience you've never had but have always wanted! Players explore levels designed to unleash their inner fury. Each main level is themed around a real-world scenario and includes hidden bonus levels and other funny hidden treasures. Toxic Therapy provides a way for players to let loose where playful destruction is not just allowed but encouraged.

Levels:

  • Quit Your Day Job: Play with staplers, power up with your office plant, or reenact that famous scene with a copy machine. Ditch the reports and flip the table in the meeting. Enjoy your office space!
  • Last Shift: Work your last shift exactly how you want to. Throw drinks or shoot customers with boba, and walk out like a boss on your own terms.
  • Rule School: Take center stage in a colorful elementary school. Live that Main Character life - be unstoppable at Dodgeball or put the smackdown on a bully.
  • Public Freakout: Long lines, ridiculous gas prices, and terrible food - all the triggers. Have your moment with no judgement.

This is your VR playground. What will you do?

Features:

  • Multiple interactive levels
  • Physics-based objects for realistic interactions
  • Open-ended gameplay - experiment and have FUN
  • Intuitive VR controls

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Room Scale 2m by 1.5m area required

short_description: Toxic Therapy is a VR game that's stocked with breakable items, fun discoveries, and an arsenal of tools.
